This titan of the six-string has been facing down some gnarly health issues while shredding the stage, and you bet your bottom Bitcoin that fans are buzzing like a faulty amp about his recent weight loss. But hey, before you fire up that judgment cannon, Greg's out there confirming he's still got the power to unleash those earth-shattering riffs! ğŸ¤˜âš¡ï¸
